String Theory

Why limit yourself to four dimensions? Buy now your string theory fabric. Vibrating strings form an 11 dimensional supersymmetric fabric of bosons and fermions. Choose your vibrational state, now including gravitons. Vacuum state is not in stock at the moment.

Available in type I, type IIA, type IIB, and two flavors of heterotic string theory (SO(32) and E8Ã—E8) The different theories allow different types of strings, and the particles that arise at low energies exhibit different symmetries. The type I theory includes both open strings (which are segments with endpoints) and closed strings (which form closed loops), while types IIA, IIB and heterotic include only closed strings.
